intro: From one chance conversation to a lifetime of choosing each other, this is our story.

timeline.title: How We Met
timeline.body: We met at a neighborhood book cafe and turned a short chat into an evening walk that never really ended.

timeline.title: The Proposal
timeline.body: On a sunset terrace overlooking the sea, surrounded by candles and lilies, we said yes to forever.

timeline.title: The Journey
timeline.body: Our life has been built in everyday rituals, big dreams, and a deep gratitude for our family and friends.
